name: Froggo and Roll
description:
Summary

Once upon a time, there was a little frog locked in a tower full of square rooms. One day, he had an idea to escape from there. Start rotating the rooms to reach the exit.

Rotate, solve the puzzle and find the exit! Roll the froggo, to exit the tower.

Controls
  • Move - A and B
  • R - Reset the game
  • Escape - Exit
Developers
  • Daniel Álamo
  • Miriam Cabrera
